channel.title: Adding a cape
channel.description: I added a cape to my server and I forgot to add the animation to it. So I opened it up in DatMaker and I went to add an animation, but didn't know which one to choose. Then I was wondering if I was supposed to be adding the animation in DatMaker, like you do with weapons, or if I have to add it in my source. Getting to the point.....do I use DatMake to add a cape animation, or do I have to code it into my server

item.title: Adding a cape
item.dc:creator: @Rskit-kat Rskit-kat
item.description:
@Rskit-kat wrote:

I added a cape to my server and I forgot to add the animation to it. So I opened it up in DatMaker and I went to add an animation, but didn’t know which one to choose. Then I was wondering if I was supposed to be adding the animation in DatMaker, like you do with weapons, or if I have to add it in my source. Getting to the point…do I use DatMake to add a cape animation, or do I have to code it into my server

Read full topic
